member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.ObjectEditorCamViewState.ApplyAxisLock(Duality.Vector3,Duality.Vector3,Duality.Vector3)
member.summary: Returns an axis-locked version of the specified vector, if requested by the user. Doesn't do anything when no axis lock is in currently active.
member.param: The base vector without any locking in place.
A reference vector that represents the base vector being locked to all axes at once.
The movement vector to evaluate in order to determine the axes to which the base vector will be locked.

member.name: T:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState
member.summary: Provides a full preview of the game within the editor. This state renders the games actual audiovisual output and reroutes user input to the game.

member.name: T:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SpecialRenderSize
member.summary: Describes rendering size preset roles that may have special behaviour.

member.name: F:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SpecialRenderSize.Fixed
member.summary: A fixed size is used, regardless of game settings or window sizes.

member.name: F:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SpecialRenderSize.CamView
member.summary: Matches the client size.

member.name: F:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SpecialRenderSize.GameTarget
member.summary: Matches the target size of the game, based on forced rendering size settings and default screen resolution.

member.summary: [GET] The antialiasing quality that is preferred by the game.

member.summary: [GET] The target rendering size that is preferred by the game. Depends on default window size and forced resolution settings.

member.summary: [GET] The target rendering size that is preferred by the client area.

member.summary: [GET / SET] The rendering size that will be used for displaying the game in this .

member.name: P:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.TargetRenderSizeMode
member.summary: [GET / SET] The special rendering size role that is currently active for dynamically choosing rendering size in this .

member.name: P:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.TargetSizeFitsClientArea
member.summary: [GET] Whether the currently used fits completely inside the available client area without having to downscale.

member.name: P:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.UseOffscreenBuffer
member.summary: [GET] Whether an offscreen buffer should be used for rendering the game.

member.name: P:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.LocalGameWindowRect
member.summary: [GET] The rect inside the local client area that will be occupied by the game rendering. Pixels outside this rect will not be rendered to by the game.

member.summary: Creates the main toolbar items that are only available while the is active.

member.summary: Disposes any main toolbar items that have been created during .

member.summary: Initializes dropdown menu items for the rendering size preset toolbar button. Will clean up or update previous contents when called multiple times.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.ApplyTargetRenderSizeMode
member.summary: Applies the dynamic rendering size that is defined by the currently used . Does nothing if that mode is .

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.UpdateTargetRenderSizeUI
member.summary: Updates the render size UI textboxes to display the current internal rendering size value.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.ParseAndValidateTargetRenderSize
member.summary: Parses the render size UI textbox contents, and applies the validated and clamped values to the internal rendering size value.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SampleRecentTargetRenderSize
member.summary: Flags the currently applied rendering size as recently used. Shouldn't be called on every change, because users generally do multiple changes (modify X and Y, potentially mistype, etc.) until the final value is entered.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.CleanupRenderTarget
member.summary: Disposes any potentially allocated internal offscreen rendering target for rendering the game.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SetupOutputRenderTarget
member.summary: Sets up an offscreen rendering target for rendering the game. If one was already available, the existing target is updated to match the current rendering size and settings.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState.SetupBlitDevice
member.summary: Sets up a to be used for blitting an internal offscreen rendering target to the actual window surface.

member.summary: Allows you to edit the collision geometry of a .
